mapper.select: select * from book_info order by bi_seq desc limit 10 offset #{offset}
mapper.insert: insert into book_info(bi_title, bi_author, bi_price, bi_description, bi_stock, bi_category, bi_status) value (#{bi_title}, #{bi_author}, #{bi_price}, #{bi_description}, #{bi_stock}, #{bi_category}, #{bi_status})
